column15: No schedule for contact classes. No guidance. Its like just give exam. How Sem 3 will be conducted. No proper information by the center. Matter is transferred to university. University says contact to center. The center persons do not respond on whats app ablut notice, circulars and class schedules. Institute need to improve a lot. Even professors did not take classes as per the schedule given. Only Finance and OR class was done. That too within 1 month.
The guidance and support can be more clear .
